name: Illinois Tool Works Inc.
description: Illinois Tool Works Inc. (ITW) is a global multi-industrial manufacturer that produces a diverse range of engineered products and specialty systems. Founded in 1912, ITW operates in over 50 countries and employs more than 48,000 individuals. The company is renowned for its innovation in the manufacturing sector, providing solutions across various industries including automotive, construction, food and beverage, and electronics. ITW's portfolio includes well-known brands such as Miller Electric, Hobart, and Paslode, which offer a wide array of tools and equipment. The company is committed to continuous improvement and has adopted the 'ITW Business Model,' which focuses on decentralized management and innovation to drive growth. ITW is recognized for its operational excellence, consistently delivering high-quality products while maintaining strong customer relationships. The company also emphasizes sustainability, investing in environmentally friendly practices and solutions. With a strong focus on research and development, ITW strives to create advanced products that meet the evolving needs of its customers worldwide, ensuring a competitive advantage in the marketplace.
